name: Train Simulator 2021: Metro-North Kawasaki M8 EMU
summary: One of the newest electric multiple units for the Northeast Corridor comes to Train Simulator 2021 in Metro-North's familiar bare metal and red livery. Built by Kawasaki at Lincoln, Nebraska for use on the New Haven Line, the M8 first entered service in March 2011 as a replacement to the current fleet of M2, M4 and M6 multiple units.
